name: market for coating, with melamine impregnated paper | coating, with melamine impregnated paper | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10670/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'coating, with melamine impregnated paper', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of coating, with melamine impregnated paper. The service represents the double-sided coating of 1 m2 wood-based board with a melamine impregnated paper with a  302 gr/m2, corresponding to a paper mass of 104 gr/m2. The process includes input of melamine paper, water consumption, heat and electricity consumption and materials end-of-life. The input of wood-based board is excluded and should be added manually. 

This activity starts with the provision of the service of coating with melamine impregnated paper by the activity supplying this service. 

This dataset represents the service of coating and thus does not include any transport.
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/162:Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials/1621:Manufacture of veneer sheets and wood-based panels
